languages.text: {n}Образ Домин встает перед глазами, и я всматриваюсь в него непозволительно долго. Я не ведала, что связь между нами будет... такой. Висирь не предупреждал меня, как важна и дорога она станет для меня. Я отдаюсь своей слабости до конца, и смятение, царящее в разуме, ослабевает.{/n}

{n}The image of Domin'{rt_name} comes into view, and I gaze upon it for an inexcusable length of time. I did not know that the bond between us would be so... strong. The Vizsier did not warn me how important and precious it might become. I give into my weakness, and the confusion in my mind lessens.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Образ Домин встает перед глазами, и я всматриваюсь в него непозволительно долго. Я не ведала, что связь между нами будет... такой. Висирь не предупреждал меня, как важна и дорога она станет для меня. Я отдаюсь своей слабости до конца, и смятение, царящее в разуме, ослабевает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The image of Enim comes into view, and I gaze upon it for an inordinate amount of time. I had no idea the bond between us would be so... strong. Vizsier did not warn me how important and precious it would become. I give into my weakness, and the confusion in my mind lessens.{/n}

The Vizsier did not warn me how important and precious it might become. I give into my weakness, and the confusion in my mind lessens.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Bild von Domin'{rt_name} kommt ins Sichtfeld, und ich sehe es unentschuldbar lange an. Ich wusste nicht, dass unser Band ... so stark sein würde. Der Wesir hat mich nicht gewarnt, wie wichtig und wertvoll es werden könnte. Ich gebe meiner Schwäche nach, und die Verwirrung in meinem Geist lässt nach.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The image of Domin'{rt_name} comes into view, and I gaze upon it for an inexcusable length of time. I did not know that the bond between us would be so... strong. The Vizsier did not warn me how important and precious it might become. I give into my weakness, and the confusion in my mind lessens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Bild von Domin'{rt_name} kommt ins Sichtfeld, und ich sehe es unentschuldbar lange an. Ich wusste nicht, dass unser Band ... so stark sein würde. Der Wesir hat mich nicht gewarnt, wie wichtig und wertvoll es werden könnte. Ich gebe meiner Schwäche nach, und die Verwirrung in meinem Geist lässt nach.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La imagen de Domin'{rt_name} se vuelve visible, y la observo durante una cantidad inexcusable de tiempo. No sabía que nuestro vínculo podría ser tan... fuerte. El Visir no me advirtió de lo importante y preciado que podía ser. Me rindo a mi debilidad y la confusión de mi mente se reduce.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The image of Domin'{rt_name} comes into view, and I gaze upon it for an inexcusable length of time. I did not know that the bond between us would be so... strong. The Vizsier did not warn me how important and precious it might become. I give into my weakness, and the confusion in my mind lessens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La imagen de Domin'{rt_name} se vuelve visible, y la observo durante una cantidad inexcusable de tiempo. No sabía que nuestro vínculo podría ser tan... fuerte. El Visir no me advirtió de lo importante y preciado que podía ser. Me rindo a mi debilidad y la confusión de mi mente se reduce.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ドミン・{rt_name}の姿が視界に浮かんで、弁解ができないほど長い間、その姿を見つめてしまう。私たちの絆がこれほどまでに…固く結びつくとは。それがどれほど大切で尊いものになるのか、ヴィジールは教えてくれなかった。自分の弱さに身を任せると、心の混乱は治った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The image of Domin'{rt_name} comes into view, and I gaze upon it for an inexcusable length of time. I did not know that the bond between us would be so... strong. The Vizsier did not warn me how important and precious it might become. I give into my weakness, and the confusion in my mind lessens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エニム・{name}の姿が視界に浮かんで、弁解ができないほど長い間、その姿を見つめてしまう。私たちの絆がこれほどまでに…固く結びつくとは。それがどれほど大切で尊いものになるのか、ヴィジールは教えてくれなかった。自分の弱さに身を任せると、心の混乱は治った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}秘者{rt_name}的面容映入我的眼帘，我看了好久好久，漫长得不可原谅。我之前并不清楚，我们之间的羁绊竟然会如此……坚实有力。宿老从来没有警告过我，说我们之间的联结竟会变得如此重要、如此珍贵。我任由心中的弱点摆布，意识中的困惑也逐渐消退。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The image of Domin'{rt_name} comes into view, and I gaze upon it for an inexcusable length of time. I did not know that the bond between us would be so... strong. The Vizsier did not warn me how important and precious it might become. I give into my weakness, and the confusion in my mind lessens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}秘者{rt_name}的面容映入我的眼帘，我看了好久好久，漫长得不可原谅。我之前并不清楚，我们之间的羁绊竟然会如此……坚实有力。宿老从来没有警告过我，说我们之间的联结竟会变得如此重要、如此珍贵。我任由心中的弱点摆布，意识中的困惑也逐渐消退。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'image {rt_mf|du|de la} Domin'{rt_name} m'apparaît et je la contemple pendant un laps de temps inexcusable. Je n'imaginais pas que le lien entre nous serait si... puissant. Le vizir ne m'avait pas avertie combien il deviendrait important et précieux pour moi. Je m'abandonne à ma faiblesse et la confusion de mon esprit s'apaise.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The image of Domin'{rt_name} comes into view, and I gaze upon it for an inexcusable length of time. I did not know that the bond between us would be so... strong. The Vizsier did not warn me how important and precious it might become. I give into my weakness, and the confusion in my mind lessens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'image {rt_mf|du|de la} Domin'{rt_name} m'apparaît et je la contemple pendant un laps de temps inexcusable. Je n'imaginais pas que le lien entre nous serait si... puissant. Le vizir ne m'avait pas avertie combien il deviendrait important et précieux pour moi. Je m'abandonne à ma faiblesse et la confusion de mon esprit s'apaise.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Domin'{rt_name}, görüş alanıma giriyor. Mazur görülemeyecek kadar uzun bir süre boyunca gözlerimi ondan ayırmıyorum. Aramızdaki bağın bu denli... Güçlü olabileceğini tahmin etmezdim. Vezir, bunun ne kadar önemli ve kıymetli olabileceğine dair beni uyarmadı. Zayıflığıma teslim oldum ve zihnimdeki karışıklık hafiflemeye başladı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The image of Domin'{rt_name} comes into view, and I gaze upon it for an inexcusable length of time. I did not know that the bond between us would be so... strong. The Vizsier did not warn me how important and precious it might become. I give into my weakness, and the confusion in my mind lessens.{/n}
